trans-unit.source: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)
trans-unit.target: 直到你的下一个回合，你的总生命不会改变，且你获得反一切保护异能。所有由你操控的永久物跃离。（它们于跃离期间视作不存在。于你的重置步骤中重置之前，它们跃回。）

trans-unit.source: Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 放逐泰菲力的庇护。

trans-unit.source: Weathered Wayfarer
trans-unit.target: 历艰旅者

trans-unit.target: 限每回合一次，你施放法术力值等于或小于X的咒语时，可以支付{0}，而不支付其法术力费用，X为预示成真上的计时指示物数量。

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·572 | Pillar of the Paruns | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a multicolored spell.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放多色咒语。

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·573 | Liliana, the Last Hope | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana, the Last Hope
trans-unit.target: 最终救星莉莲娜

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·573 | Liliana, the Last Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +1: Up to one target creature gets -2/-1 until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: +1：至多一个目标生物得-2/-1直到你的下一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·573 | Liliana, the Last Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −2: Mill two cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: −2：磨两张牌，然后你可以将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·573 | Liliana, the Last Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is two plus the number of Zombies you control."
trans-unit.target: −7：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「在你的结束步骤开始时，派出X个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物，X为由你操控的灵俑数量加二。」

trans-unit.source: Wrenn and Six
trans-unit.target: 芮恩与六树妖

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·574 | Wrenn and Six | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +1: Return up to one target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: +1：将至多一张目标地牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·574 | Wrenn and Six | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −1: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: −1：芮恩与六树妖对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·574 | Wrenn and Six | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −7: You get an emblem with "Instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard have retrace."
trans-unit.target: −7：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「你坟墓场中的瞬间与法术牌都具有追溯异能。」

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·575 | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Emrakul, the Aeons Torn
trans-unit.target: 万世创伤伊莫库

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·575 | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·575 | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放此咒语时，于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·575 | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Flying, protection from spells that are one or more colors, annihilator 6
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反有色咒语保护，歼灭6

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·575 | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.
trans-unit.target: 当万世创伤伊莫库从任何区域进入坟墓场时，其拥有者将其坟墓场洗入其牌库。

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·576 | Kozilek, Butcher of Truth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kozilek, Butcher of Truth
trans-unit.target: 真理屠夫寇基雷

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·576 | Kozilek, Butcher of Truth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, draw four cards.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放此咒语时，抓四张牌。

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·576 | Kozilek, Butcher of Truth | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.)
trans-unit.target: 歼灭4（每当此生物攻击时，防御牌手牺牲四个永久物。）

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·576 | Kozilek, Butcher of Truth | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.
trans-unit.target: 当真理屠夫寇基雷从任何区域进入坟墓场时，其拥有者将其坟墓场洗入其牌库。

trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, destroy target permanent.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放此咒语时，消灭目标永久物。

trans-unit.source: Weathered Wayfarer
trans-unit.target: 历艰旅者

trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Activate only if an opponent controls more lands than you.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：从你牌库中搜寻一张地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。只能于任一对手操控的地比你多时起动。

trans-unit.source: Bring to Light
trans-unit.target: 得见天光

trans-unit.resname: 2X2·579 | Bring to Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Converge — Search your library for a creature, instant, or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 聚辉～从你牌库中搜寻一张生物，瞬间或法术牌，且其法术力值须等于或小于施放此咒语时用来支付费用的法术力颜色数量，放逐该牌，然后洗牌。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。
